data.title: Live LTM tenders of Bhola Zilla, Barishal division and the adjacent districts.
data.text:
List of live LTM tenders of Bhola Zilla, Barishal and the adjacent districts.

Bhola is a district of Barishal division. Bhola is the only island zilla of Bangladesh. It is located in the downstream of Meghna river. Bhola has no land boundary with any other district. The neighbouring districts of Bhola are Patuakhali, Barishal, Lakshmipur, Noakhali, .

Click here to see the live tender notices of the Bhola district only.

View OSTETM tender notices. * View active OTM tenders. * View All the active tenders.

Zilla - Bhola; Division - Barishal; Method - LTM.

Live tenders on eGP platform (www.eprocure.gov.bd):
